info.description: API to retrieve the product condition details
info.title: Product Conditions

get.summary: Retrieves the Protection Limit Property details like arrangement number, actual Limit amount, Limit amount currency for a product

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

parameters.name: propertyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the product condition

get.summary: Retrieves the product availability details such as the day/time from which the specific product conditions are available

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

parameters.name: propertyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the product condition

get.summary: Retrieves the published product conditions record details like arrangement number, property name, maximum number of roles linked to the master arrangement, maximum number of users linked to a master arrangement or its roles for a product

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

parameters.name: propertyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the product condition

catProtectionLimit.description: The Protection Limit Property class is used by products which have daily limits on the cumulative amount of transactions that can be done via an external channel.

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

propertyId.description: The identifier of the product condition

limitAmount.description: The Limit amount that is actually available for use. The system limit checks are preformed against the online limit

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

negotiationRulesAttribute.description: Defines which individual attribute (field) has the negotiation rules defined in fields

negotiationRulesMessage.description: This field indicates whether to raise error or override message when rule is broken,Allows only two values ERROR or OVERRIDE,ERROR - Error message is raisedOVERRIDE - Override message is generated.

negotiationRulesOptions.description: Defines named values to indicate if an option applies to the associated NR.ATTRIBUTE. More than one option can be associated with the NR.ATTRIBUTE, with certain restrictions.
Defines named values to indicate if an option applies to the associated NR.ATTRIBUTE. More than one option can be associated with the NR.ATTRIBUTE, with certain restrictions.

negotiationRulesValue.description: Defines the value that links to the rule in field Nr.Type

negotiationRulesAttribute.description: Defines which individual attribute (field) has the negotiation rules defined in fields

negotiationRulesType.description: Defines the negotiation rule that is linked to the field defined in Nr.Attribute. If an attribute has a negotiation rule linked to it. It is possible to define more than one negotiation rule for an attribute.

negotiationRulesMessage.description: This field indicates whether to raise error or override message when rule is broken,Allows only two values ERROR or OVERRIDE,ERROR - Error message is raisedOVERRIDE - Override message is generated.
